```{r include = FALSE}

school2 <- read_csv('schools.csv', skip = 1,
  na = c("undefined", ""),
  col_types = cols(
  school = col_double(),
  address = col_character(),
  zip = col_character(),
  year = col_double(),
  type = col_character(),
  use = col_character(),
  '2_plus' = col_double(),
  private = col_double(),
  sold = col_character(),
  buyer = col_character(),
  price = col_character())) 

budget <- read_csv('budget_data.csv')
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
graph <- school2 %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  filter(type == "school closing") %>% 
  count(type) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, n)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(x = "Year", 
       y = "Number of School Shakeups", 
       title = "Number of School Shakeups in CPS from 2002-2018")

ggsave("graph/graph.png")
graph
```
